title: Connectivity, Flexibility and Integration in the Automated Lab - Technology Networks

title_detail.value: Connectivity, Flexibility and Integration in the Automated Lab - Technology Networks
summary_detail.value: Connectivity, Flexibility and Integration in the Automated Lab  Technology Networks
source.title: Technology Networks
text: Read time: 2 minutes Through automating processes and workflows, scientists and laboratories can optimize their time and concentrate on high-value tasks that yield greater productivity while ensuring accuracy and reproducibility. Across the life science fields, various components of experimental processes can now be automated, including aspects of single-cell analysis, next-generation sequencing (NGS), mass spectrometry and biopharmaceutical analysis. At The Society for Laboratory Automation and Screening (SLAS) 2023 international meeting, Technology Networks interviewed Lars Kristiansen, general manager of Agilent’s Automation Solutions Business. In our interview, we discussed Agilent’s automation portfolio that was showcased at the event, in addition to trends and challenges in automation. Extending walkaway time At SLAS 2023, Agilent launched its new NGS Bravo NGS Automated Liquid Handling Platform with On-Deck Thermal Cycler (ODTC), which enables thermal cycling as part of a high-throughput automated protocol. We asked Kristiansen how the new product can support scientists in improving their efficiency: “We’re introducing a new development on an already-established platform that addresses a key pain point for our customers: walk-away time. It sounds like a very simple change, but now that thermal cycling is on-deck, we can extend walkaway time by 250%. Scientists can now do more valuable research and experiments with that time,” he said. “The fact that we can combine our automation capabilities with our genomics kits and products is fantastic and spans applications such as genome-editing, cancer research, etc.” Another recent launch from Agilent showcased at SLAS was the AssayMAP Bravo Protein Sample Prep Workbench 4.0. The platform combines precision liquid flow control, microchromatography cartridges with diverse resin chemistries and novel software to “bring the power of chromatography to sample preparation”. Its optional compliance-enabling features enable automated sample preparation workflows to be transferred from noncompliant to compliant labs. “This product is biopharma, proteomics, peptides-focused compared to the NGS Bravo, but it’s another beautiful example of how Agilent can continue to evolve with our customers on their multi-omics journey.” A clear take-home from SLAS 2023 was that, as we work towards the lab of the future, we will see even more automated solutions enter the typical scientists’ workflow. How we integrate those solutions will be pivotal for ensuring their accessibility for a wide variety of scientists. The key to this integration will be collaboration and partnership, as Kristiansen described: “Stitching components together in a laboratory doesn’t create a customer-friendly workflow, so a key consideration here at Agilent is the use of software and lab orchestration. Internally we have a large software and informatics group, but we also look more widely at the industry and ask: who are the partners that we need to start working closely with to ensure that we can offer end-to-end custom automation solutions for our customers?” The future of automation Another key trend at SLAS 2023 was how automation workflows, the lab of the future concept and sustainability can be married together. Technology Networks asked Kristiansen how Agilent is considering sustainability in the development of new products and its overall practices. “Sustainability has always been a focus for Agilent. As well as investing in many renewable energy initiatives at our sites and facilities, we have a strong partnership with organizations such as My Green Lab, so it[sustainability] is pretty much within the DNA of Agilent. Discussing sustainability within automation specifically, we have ongoing projects surrounding our automation consumables and exploring how to increase our My Green Lab ACT (Accountability, Consistency and Transparency) accreditations on our instrument portfolio.” In 2021, Agilent also announced its commitment to achieve net-zero greenhouse gas emissions no later than 2050, which Kristiansen emphasized. While automated solutions continue to develop, key challenges remain in their design and implementation. According to Kristiansen, the three greatest barriers are: Interconnectivity and workflow orchestration – ensuring that researchers can manage their laboratory from different places, extract data, mine it and share it across platforms and laboratories. Developing partnerships within the industry – creating an ecosystem so that researchers can run the best possible experiments on their preferred platforms. Flexibility – ensuring that each scientists’ unique needs can be served through automation workflows and models. Lars Kristiansen, general manager of Agilent’s Automation Solutions Business was speaking to Molly Campbell, Senior Science Writer for Technology Networks at SLAS 2023.

title: Top 10 Best Software Companies In USA In 2023 - Inventiva

source.title: Inventiva
text: INTRODUCTION Software companies in the United States have seen tremendous growth in the past few years, with many of them becoming leading players in the global technology market. In 2023, software companies continue to innovate and develop products that are driving advances in the tech industry. Companies like Microsoft, Adobe, IBM, Oracle, and Salesforce are just some of the giants in the US software market. In terms of innovation, companies like Microsoft and IBM continue to invest heavily in research and development, creating new solutions for businesses around the world. Companies like Adobe are focused on graphics and digital media, providing tools for content creation such as Photoshop and After Effects. Oracle is a leader in database management, offering a range of solutions to manage data and keep business systems organized. Salesforce provides cloud-based customer relationship management (CRM) software that helps enterprises manage customer relationships. These large software companies are just the tip of the iceberg when it comes to software development in the US. Numerous small startups are also gaining traction in the market, developing niche solutions or tools which can be used to make complex processes more efficient. Some of these smaller companies specialize in artificial intelligence (AI) and machine learning (ML), providing helpful tools for AI-driven applications. Overall, the US software industry is still a major player in the global market in 2023, driven by the innovation of its leading companies as well as the emergence of many small startups. IMPORTANCE Software companies in the USA are becoming increasingly important in 2023 due to their ability to produce cutting-edge solutions. Software is used across many industries and can be used to automate complex processes, improve customer service, and streamline operations. It is no surprise then that software companies in the USA have become a key source of innovation and growth in the economy. One of the most important trends in software development in the USA is the increasing use of Artificial Intelligence (AI). AI technology is being integrated into software applications to create smarter and more accurate data analysis and insights. This helps companies make better decisions and take advantage of new opportunities. Automation is also becoming more prevalent as robots and AI become more powerful. This improves workplace efficiency and reduces labor costs. The growing role of cloud computing is another major trend for software companies in the US. Cloud computing offers considerable benefits such as scalability, cost savings, and increased flexibility. Companies are using cloud computing to store and access data from anywhere in the world without investing in hardware or software licenses. This is helping companies reduce IT costs and improve their operational efficiency. Finally, software companies are leveraging open source to accelerate innovation. Open source software provides developers with access to code which can be used to rapidly develop new software applications. This allows companies to quickly build new products and expand existing ones, providing a competitive edge. Overall, software companies in the USA are playing an ever-increasing role in the economy. They are driving innovation through the use of AI, automation, and cloud computing, and are taking advantage of open source software to quickly create new products. These trends will only continue in the future and software companies will remain a key part of the US economy. Here are the top 10 best software companies in USA in 2023 Microsoft – Microsoft is a technology company based in Redmond, Washington. Founded in 1975 by Bill Gates and Paul Allen, Microsoft is now one of the leading players in the technology industry. Microsoft is a household name as it produces popular and widely used products such as Windows operating systems, Office Suite, Xbox consoles, tablets, and more. Microsoft is also behind various popular cloud computing services including Azure, Dynamics 365, and Skype. Microsoft’s mission is to “empower every person and organization on the planet to achieve more.” They are committed to building innovative software, devices, and services that people can use to make things easier, better, and more efficient. Microsoft prides itself on having a diverse culture and empowering its teams to work together to bring their best ideas to life. The company is widely recognized for its commitment to corporate social responsibility, including environmental sustainability and philanthropic activities. We can expect Microsoft to continue to innovate and lead the way in the world of technology and beyond. Amazon – Amazon is a global e-commerce and technology company based in Seattle, Washington. It was founded by Jeff Bezos in 1994 and has since grown to become one of the world’s largest companies. Amazon specializes in retail sales and cloud computing services, offering customers access to products from around the world with its vast selection of books, electronics, clothing, food, toys, and more. Amazon also provides web hosting, delivery, and logistics services for businesses of all sizes. Amazon’s success has been attributed to its commitment to innovation, customer service, and competitive pricing. The company continues to expand rapidly, moving into new markets and developing new technologies such as artificial intelligence and machine learning. Amazon’s mission is to be Earth’s most customer-centric company, where customers can find and discover anything they might want to buy online. With its emphasis on convenience and personalization, Amazon has changed the way people shop and experience retail. In addition to its main website, Amazon offers mobile apps, streaming video and audio services, virtual assistant services, and physical stores. By continuing to innovate and push boundaries, Amazon has become a leader in the world of e-commerce and technology. Google – Google is a tech giant founded in 1998 by Larry Page and Sergey Brin. It is the most used search engine on the web, with over 70% of searches occurring through Google. The company also offers several other services such as Gmail, YouTube, Google Maps, Google Docs, Google Drive, Android, Chrome, and more. Google has become a leader in artificial intelligence, machine learning, and cloud computing, making it a go-to for companies looking to explore these technologies. Google’s mission is to organize the world’s information and make it universally accessible and useful. Google continues to invest heavily in research and development to push the boundaries of what is possible with technology. Its focus is on creating innovative products and services that will improve people’s lives and help people stay connected. Google is constantly working to make its products even better, by adding new features and improving existing ones. Google also recently acquired Fitbit, which allows them to further expand into the health and fitness sector. Google’s presence in the tech industry is undeniable, and they are sure to remain at the forefront of innovation. Apple – Apple Inc. is one of the world’s largest and most successful technology companies, founded in 1976 by Steve Jobs, Steve Wozniak, and Ronald Wayne. Apple designs, manufactures, and markets consumer electronics, computer hardware, software, and online services. It is best known for its iPhone, iPad, Mac, Apple Watch, AirPods, and HomePod products, as well as a variety of other products, such as the Apple TV, Apple Music, iTunes Store, App Store, and iCloud. Apple also produces a wide range of professional software for creative use, including Final Cut Pro, Logic Pro X, and Aperture. The company also offers cloud-based services such as iCloud, Apple Pay, and Apple Care. Apple is one of the world’s largest and most valuable companies, with an estimated total net worth of over $1 trillion (USD). In terms of design and innovation, Apple products are often praised for their simplicity and usability. The company has received numerous awards for its products, including the prestigious Emmy award for outstanding industrial design in 2008. Apple products are renowned for their sleek look, intuitive user interfaces, and a wide range of features. Apple is also known for its corporate culture and commitment to philanthropy. The company has donated millions of dollars to humanitarian causes, such as AIDS research, disaster relief, and environmental protection. Additionally, Apple has contributed significantly to the development of education, healthcare, and social programs across the world. The company has also made a commitment to sustainability and renewable energy. Apple has introduced several renewable energy initiatives, such as the solar farm built at their Nevada data center and the use of recycled aluminum in many of their products. As of 2021, Apple is 100% powered by renewable energy. Overall, Apple is a global leader in the technology sector and continues to push the boundaries of innovation. Apple products have revolutionized the way we work, play, and communicate, and its commitment to sustainability, philanthropy, and customer satisfaction make it a respected global brand. Salesforce – Salesforce is a cloud computing company based in San Francisco, California. They provide customer relationship management (CRM) solutions to businesses of all sizes. Salesforce’s suite of products include their flagship CRM software, which helps businesses manage sales and marketing activities, as well as customer support and service operations. Additionally, they offer marketing automation, analytics and mobile solutions. Their software also integrates with other business applications, such as Google Apps, Microsoft Azure and Amazon Web Services. Salesforce has over 150,000 customers worldwide and is one of the largest and most successful technology companies in the world. Salesforce was founded in 1999 by Marc Benioff and Parker Harris. Benioff had the idea for a customer-focused CRM after his experience at Oracle Corporation. He wanted to make customer service easy and accessible for users, regardless of technical expertise. In 2000, Salesforce introduced its first product, Salesforce.com, which provided customer data management, customer support, and analytics. Since then, Salesforce has grown and expanded into new markets and industries, including health care, finance, education, and retail. Salesforce offers a wide range of services and features to help businesses succeed. Their products are designed to simplify customer relationship management, strengthen customer loyalty and drive revenue growth. They provide customer relationship management solutions with powerful analytics, customer segmentation, customer service and marketing automation capabilities. Salesforce also provides industry-specific apps and tools, such as Health Cloud and Financial Services Cloud, that cater to the needs of those industries. In addition, Salesforce offers consulting, training and certification programs to help customers get the most out of their investments. They also have customer success teams and customer communities that provide customer support and advice. The Salesforce AppExchange enables customers to purchase and integrate third-party apps into their Salesforce environment. Overall, Salesforce is an innovative, customer-focused cloud computing company that provides businesses with a comprehensive platform for customer relationship management. Their products are designed to help businesses grow and increase customer loyalty. They offer powerful, customizable solutions for a variety of industries, and excellent customer support and training. Oracle – Oracle is a leading technology company based in Redwood City, California. Founded in 1977, Oracle is one of the largest software companies in the world, with a market capitalization of more than $180 billion. Oracle provides a wide range of cloud, infrastructure and platform services, as well as applications for enterprise resource planning (ERP), customer relationship management (CRM), supply chain management (SCM) and human resources (HR). Oracle’s cloud offerings also include cloud-native solutions such as analytics, artificial intelligence and blockchain. Oracle’s vast portfolio of products, services and solutions help organizations across industries to succeed. Oracle’s commitment to innovation and its focus on customer success have made it a leader in the field of enterprise solutions. Oracle is committed to developing products that are reliable, secure and scalable, making them an ideal partner for businesses of all sizes. Oracle’s cloud solutions provide customers with the tools they need to move their operations into the digital age, while still providing the security and reliability they need. Oracle’s commitment to customer service ensures that each customer gets the best possible experience when using their products and services. Oracle’s commitment to innovation has helped to make their products and services some of the most popular in the industry, allowing customers to leverage the latest technology to accelerate their business operations. Adobe – Adobe is a global software company that creates and develops digital media solutions. The company’s primary products include Creative Cloud, a suite of creative software such as Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign and Adobe XD; Acrobat DC, a document management solution; and Experience Cloud, a suite of marketing and analytics solutions. Founded in 1982 by John Warnock and Charles Geschke, the company has grown to become one of the most recognizable brands in the world. Adobe has offices around the world, with headquarters in San Jose, California. It employs over 17,000 people in more than 40 countries. The company has a strong focus on innovation, which it applies to both its products and its corporate culture. Adobe encourages employees to experiment, be creative and take risks. Adobe prides itself on delivering award-winning customer experiences. Its products are used by millions of people around the world, from students and photographers to businesses and creative professionals. Its customers span a wide range of industries including advertising, education, gaming, healthcare and retail. The company continues to invest heavily in research and development, with the aim of creating tools that are faster, more powerful and easier to use. Adobe also works closely with industry partners to help them create innovative products and services. Adobe’s products are designed to enable its customers to bring their ideas to life and express themselves in new and exciting ways. IBM – IBM (International Business Machines Corporation) is a global technology company that provides a wide range of IT services and products, including cloud computing solutions and AI (Artificial Intelligence). Founded in 1911, it is one of the oldest tech companies in the world. IBM has operations in more than 170 countries and employs over 350,000 people globally. IBM focuses on developing innovative solutions to help businesses solve complex problems. Some of their most popular products and services include cloud computing, artificial intelligence, cognitive computing, blockchain, analytics, mobility, security and Internet of Things (IoT). The company’s research efforts are also renowned and they invest heavily in R&D. IBM’s research teams focus on topics such as quantum computing, nanotechnology, healthcare and renewable energy. Their team of scientists and engineers work with universities and industry partners to develop breakthrough technologies. IBM also prides itself on being a leader in corporate responsibility. They strive to create socially responsible products and initiatives, such as their 2030 Climate Commitment to reduce greenhouse gas emissions by 65%. Additionally, their Corporate Service Corps program helps to develop skills and capabilities in emerging markets. Overall, IBM is an iconic technology company that has been a leader in innovation for over 100 years. From pioneering mainframe computers to creating cloud-based AI solutions, IBM is continually pushing the boundaries of what’s possible. Intuit – Intuit Inc. is a financial software company based in Mountain View, California. Founded in 1983, the company specializes in providing financial management services for small businesses, individuals, and accountants through its flagship products: QuickBooks, TurboTax, and ProConnect. Intuit also offers mobile applications and services to help customers manage their finances on the go. The company has more than 8 million customers in North America and provides online tax preparation and filing services for customers worldwide. Intuit’s mission is to power prosperity around the world. It strives to provide a comprehensive suite of finance-related services that make it easier for people to access and manage their finances. Through its innovative products, Intuit helps to empower small business owners and individuals to better manage their personal finances. Its products are designed to be user-friendly, secure, and reliable, with features such as bank feeds and integrated payroll processing making it easier for users to manage their finances. Intuit’s commitment to customer service is reflected in its 24/7 support network and dedicated customer service staff. The company is committed to having a positive impact on the global economy by helping customers take control of their finances. With over 35 years of experience, Intuit continues to lead the way in financial software solutions. SAP – SAP is a multinational software company that specializes in enterprise application software for organizations and businesses. Founded in 1972 by five former IBM employees, the company has grown from its original German roots to become a global leader in business solutions. SAP offers a wide range of products and services, including enterprise resource planning (ERP) software, analytics, cloud computing, and the Internet of Things. With over 400,000 customers in more than 180 countries, SAP is truly a global giant in the world of software. SAP’s ERP software helps companies manage their financials, human resources, manufacturing, supply chain, sales, and other operations more efficiently. It also provides visibility across an entire organization, enabling executives to make informed decisions based on accurate data. With SAP’s analytics, businesses can leverage real-time insights to make decisions quickly, while its cloud solutions provide users with the flexibility they need to stay agile. Finally, SAP’s IOT capabilities allow businesses to maximize efficiency by connecting data from multiple sources and systems. SAP is known for its commitment to innovation and customer satisfaction, making it a leader in the software industry. The company is constantly developing new features and enhancements to its existing applications and cloud services, ensuring that it stays ahead of the competition. On top of this, SAP provides excellent customer service, ensuring that any queries or issues are addressed quickly and professionally. Overall, SAP is a powerhouse in the software industry, offering cutting edge technology and solutions that help business leaders make smart decisions. The company’s commitment to innovation and customer satisfaction makes it one of the most popular options for businesses around the world. CONCLUSION In 2023, software companies in the USA have experienced tremendous growth, becoming an integral part of many industries. These companies have developed cutting-edge technology solutions to help businesses increase productivity and profitability. Software companies are now offering cloud computing services, artificial intelligence applications, and virtual reality experiences. Companies have also invested heavily in digital marketing, helping them to expand their reach and customer base. The USA has become a hub for software development, with some of the most innovative products and services being created in the country. All of these advancements have led to increased job opportunities and economic growth.
